name: GNOME (thennediel)
description:
He's known by many names.

Gnorman.

Gnomeo. 

Gnorbert.

Gno Homo.

No matter the name, only he can save the Gnoman's Land that is his home.

Plant seeds to ascend the roots to the surface and defeat the evil Grandma Pesticide poisoning your home.

Will you help him make it, or will you allow for his roots drown in poison?

Art

Annemarie Ollendorf

Alina Roessner

Anou Lange

Programming

Konstantin Schubert

Music & Sound

Paul Gleitsmann
